name: xPRESTE
overview: xPRESTE exists to provide improved ways of working for operational staff through the use of software that bridges the gap between business application packages and Microsoft Office, providing an integrated end-user experience. xPRESTE focuses on software developed outside the UK, providing an experienced channel into local markets. All products speed-up and simplify business processes and reduce the need for training operational staff in complex specialist packages. All software sold can be managed inhouse and will work in hosted and cloud environments as well as local networks. xPRESTE are always interested to hear from overseas companies with appropriate products looking for UK partners.
